import React , { useState } from "react"; import useStyles from "./Request-jss"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import { WEBSITE_NAME } from "../../../utils/websiteData"; const Request = () => { const [post, setPost] = useState({ category: 0, content: '', }); const classes = useStyles(); const onChange = (e) => { console.log(category); setPost({ ...post, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } const category = () => { } const onSubmit = () => { } return ( <> {`${WEBSITE_NAME} | Add request`}

Add a Request

) } export default Request ;
